# multilineTextAlignment(strategy:)

**Instance Method**

A modifier for the default text alignment strategy in the view hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func multilineTextAlignment(strategy: Text.AlignmentStrategy) -> some View

```

## Discussion

To control the alignment explicitly at a view level, choose the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Text/AlignmentStrategy/layoutBased] mode and set the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/multilineTextAlignment] to the appropriate value.
